# Contributing

Thank you for contributing!

## Getting Started

1. Fork the repo
2. Clone: `git clone https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/backend-challenges.git`
3. Create branch: `git checkout -b feature/your-change`
4. Make changes
5. Commit: `git commit -m "feat: description"`
6. Push: `git push origin feature/your-change`
7. Create PR

## Types of Contributions

- New challenges
- Challenge improvements
- Documentation updates
- Repository maintenance

## Challenge Guidelines

- Follow template
- Tech-agnostic
- Appropriate level
- Clear instructions
- Testable

Levels:
- Beginner: Basic APIs, no DB
- Junior: CRUD, auth, external APIs
- Middle: Caching, webhooks, CI/CD
- Senior: Microservices, advanced architecture

## Commit Messages

Use conventional commits: feat:, fix:, docs:, etc.

## Contact

Issues: [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/wesleybertipaglia/backend-challenges/issues)
